events.name: cfsummit updates and microservices!
events.description:
7PM to 7.30 PM - Community update Cloud Foundry Summit Asia is the premier event for developers and cloud operators using the industry's Open Source Platform-as-a-Service standard: Cloud Foundry.Sergiu is Senior Solution Architect @ Pivotal he will share the lessons learned from CF Summit Shanghai. Feel free to join us on a session where you can learn the latest roadmap updates and ask questions.  7.45PM to 8.30PM - live-coding session on micro-services We will demonstrate how to build micro-services from scratch using Spring, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud and Cloud Foundry. 


 disclaimer: this meetup will  be dedicated 100% to open source products. Commercial features will not be discussed.
events.location: IDA @ Sandcrawler, 1 Fusionopolis View, #08-02 Sandcrawler, 138577, Singapore

events.name: PowerShell Meet Up with Dan Harman - PowerShell Product Team
events.description: This is a bit of an impromptu meeting as Dan Harman from the PowerShell Product Team is in town. Rather than a rigid presentation style, this will be a discussion and Q&A on Nano Server and IoT, it will very likely have some demo, it will definitely be an "ask Dan anything" session so if you have PowerShell or Windows Management questions, now is your chance to ask. We may talk about DSC in Azure. Dan would love to connect with the Singapore community, please take advantage of this opportunity to bring your questions and feedback on all things PowerShell. Come and meet and hang out. Dan Harman is a Principal Program Manager at Microsoft in Redmond.
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22, Meeting Room

events.name: Meetup with Ben Chan of Bitgo - MultiSignature Wallet Provider
events.description:
New to Bitcoin?  Here's a good video intro: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t5JGQXCTe3c Let's close out 2015 with a fun night of beer and bitcoin! Ben Chan (Bitgo) will be in town post scaling bitcoin workshop, and he'll share his experiences with building wallet platforms, p2sh, and multisig applications as well as the latest news on scaling bitcoin. Please RSVP so we know if we have enough space for everyone. 



See you then! 



David
events.location: Hermitage Wine @ NTUC Centre, One Marina Boulevard #B1-04, S(018989), Singapore
